Toggle

Hide, switch or change the appearance of different contents through a toggle.

Usage

Open this example in a new window 

  <button class="button" data-module="Toggle">Toggle</button>

Target

Open this example in a new window 

  data-options="{"target": ".lab-example-target"}"

Active class


  data-options="{"activeClass": "new-active-class}"

Resources

  • Jaywing Frontend Component Library

Currently v0.0.1.
